transportAdvice: Düsseldorf has an excellent integrated public transit network including metro (U-Bahn), trams, and buses that connect the city centre, airport, and major tourist areas efficiently. The Altstadt and riverside areas are very walkable, and taxis are readily available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cold and grey with frequent rain and occasional frost; pack warm, waterproof layers.
Still cold and damp with overcast skies, though daylight hours begin to lengthen slightly.
Early spring brings milder temperatures and occasional sunny spells between rain showers.
Pleasant spring weather with blooming trees and a mix of sunshine and showers.
Warm and increasingly sunny, making it a lovely time to explore the riverside and outdoor cafes.
Warm early summer with long days, though afternoon thunderstorms are possible.
The warmest month with long sunny days; occasional heavy showers can interrupt outdoor plans.
Warm and pleasant with similar conditions to July; a popular month for outdoor events.
Early autumn brings cooler evenings and comfortable daytime temperatures with less rain.
Noticeably cooler and wetter with autumn foliage; a jacket and umbrella are essential.
Grey, damp, and cold with frequent rain; the Christmas markets begin to open late in the month.
Cold and festive with renowned Christmas markets; snow is possible but not guaranteed.
